ingredients.item: 200g essential Waitrose Easy Cook Long Grain Rice
500g pack essential Waitrose Spring Greens, shredded

instructions.step: Cook the rice in boiling water for 12–15 minutes until tender, then drain.
Meanwhile, boil the greens in a large saucepan for 4–5 minutes, then drain well.
Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the red pepper for 3–4 minutes; add the lentils and spring greens. Stir in the rice and soy sauce, then serve.
